title: Berlin court tells X to let Hungarian election researchers access data
summary_full: Court of Appeal tells X to hand over public data to two German-based civil society groups which are researching election risks under the EU's Digital Services Act
summary_public: Court of Appeal tells X to hand over public data to two German-based civil society groups which are researching election risks under the EU's Digital Services Act
